caption.p: View of nanoparticles of gold colloids ( a) and silver ( b) after fractionation and placement on a nylon diaphragm (Supelco, Park Bellefonte, PA, USA) made with a help of FEI Quanta 200 FEG scanning electron microscope. The magnification applied to the observed colloidal gold and silver 50,000 ( a) and 150,000 ( b) times, respectively.
